storyInfo: Tatjana risks her life to protect the citizenry by rushing out into the middle of the riot. Fortunately, GreyThroat and Ayerscarpe join in the nick of time, but the riot is still on the verge of escalating out of control.

attributes.content: Hurry! This way!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Thanks!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Folinic!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Lisa! Take the civilians and get out of here!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Gah—!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Are the rioters... just attacking at random?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Hey! It wasn't easy to get that gizmo. You better shoot straight!
attributes.name: Armed Infected A

attributes.content: Shut it! This thing isn't easy to use! Luckily I studied at the conservatory!
attributes.name: Armed Infected B

attributes.content: Which one?! Hey, Gendarmerie! Don't do anything stupid. We got hostages!
attributes.name: Armed Infected A

attributes.content: What hostages?!
attributes.name: Armed Infected B

attributes.content: Arschgeige! The ones running down the street!
attributes.name: Armed Infected A

attributes.content: Hmph!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Miss Folinic! You have to stop them!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Everything here is made of wood. This whole block will go up in flames!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Fire! Put it out! Everyone else, get out of here!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: So many innocent people won't make it out in time. We must save them!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: How are we supposed to get over there?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Gah! The fire!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Folinic! Please tend to the wounded!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Winterwisps! Infected! Vermin!
attributes.name: Stubborn Townsfolk

attributes.content: Why did you burn my home?! Why?! We did so much for you!
attributes.name: Stubborn Townsfolk

attributes.content: Watch your head.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Stubborn Townsfolk

attributes.content: Hmm... Oh. Tatjana? A-are you okay?!
attributes.name: Stubborn Townsfolk

attributes.content: Ugh... I'm fine. But they can't control those automatic Arts units. We're in danger here!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: We'll fight back together! Push them out!
attributes.name: Stubborn Townsfolk

attributes.content: Now... isn't the time...! Gah...!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Your foot...! F-fine, I'll listen to you!
attributes.name: Stubborn Townsfolk

attributes.content: Get out of here!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: (This terrible pain in my ankle... is my bone broken? Damn it...)
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: (I have to get back to the others...)
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: You! Noble puppet!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: Huh?!
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: They all routed?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Y- yes!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Mr. Severin, we have a lot of wounded. We need help...!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Medics, you are to obey this young Vulpo's every word. Able-bodied youth will help as well.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Yes, sir!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: If only Miss Folinic was here...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Wait... she isn't back yet?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Oi! Where are Folinic and Tatjana?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They, I think they're still at Zwölftontechnik Strasse...
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: Did I not just ask if they all routed?!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Er! S- sorry, sir! But Folinic and Tatjana should be alright. They've saved many lives!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: What do you mean they'll be alright? The insurgents have control of our town's defenses, we have no regular troops, and——*cough* *cough* *cough*!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ——*cough*, get some heavies and come with me.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But they have firepower, and maybe hostages. We shouldn't provoke them any more. Let's wait for a chance to parley.
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: A chance? You're going to wait for the enemy to give you a chance? Have you ever fought a battle?!
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: S-sorry!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: But his concerns are reasonable. The active Originium left behind by the Great Rift are likely still in the foundation of Wolumonde. The consequences of letting them destroy it would be unthinkable.
Where did you come from? You shouldn't be here!
attributes.name: Townsfolk

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: With no Gendarmerie, we're the ones who shouldn't be here... I've seen you before, Rhodes Island Operators.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Thank you for understanding. Ayerscarpe?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: A quick, on-the-spot assessment: if they continue to bombard the area with that device, we have ten to thirty minutes before Wolumonde comes to a halt.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: The best way to handle this would be to sever the link between this district and the rest of the city, but Wolumonde is no nomadic city. Individual districts do not have the power to move autonomously.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Actually, a tractor could do it... But not when the streets are full of rebels.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Is there an application procedure for an armed intervention?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...Go nuts.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And please... Be sure to save Tatjana and Folinic.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Mr. Severin, we need— Ah!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: ...Lisa?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Is... is that Operator GreyThroat? And who's this?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Operator Ayerscarpe, bodyguard of Catastrophe Messenger Leonhardt. He is out on another mission, so I got dragged over here.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Lisa, where are Atro and Folinic?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Miss Folinic is still in there! But Miss Atro... she's... um...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: It's okay. I understand. I just had to be sure... We'll talk about it later.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Mmm... It's, it's nice to have some senior operators coming to help...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: B-but I still need to stay focused!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I'll take care of the wounded. Whatever you do, please bring Miss Folinic back safely!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Right. I will.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Such a young child... she's an operator?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Amiya isn't much older than Lisa, you know.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Yeah...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: We did not plan for this rescue, nor do we have the protective equipment. Are you going to be okay?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: What a surprise. They always said you couldn't handle working around Originium. I was worried.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: I've had enough of tragedy is all. Saving lives is what matters. Cut the chatter.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: What the? More people coming in?
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: And they're fast! G-get rid of them!
attributes.name: Armed Infected

attributes.content: So many locals. You fine with that?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Avoid the vitals. Engage.
attributes.name: GreyThroat
